tool_description: Designed to enhance your contact data using advanced AI techniques. By submitting your contact information to the API, you will receive a comprehensive enrichment response that includes the contact's current employment status, alternative email addresses, employment history, and a detailed DISC personality analysis and many other details. This analysis also provides valuable tips on the most effective communication and sales strategies for engaging with the contact. The enriched data is perfe...
name: Tigertek Contacts Enrichment API
title: Tigertek Contacts Enrichment API

api_list.name: enrich
api_list.description:
Submits contact data to the API and receives a heavily enriched response, including current work situation, other emails, employment history, DISC personality analysis, and tips on how best to communicate and sell to the contact. Excellent for enriching your CRM.

**Request Object:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| firstName | string | Yes | The first name of the contact. |
| lastName | string | Yes | The last name of the contact. |
| email | string | Yes | The email address of the contact. |
| lead | string | No | The company name of the contact. |
| linkedin | string | Yes | The LinkedIn profile URL of the contact. Exclude the trailing slash. |
| userId | string | Yes | A unique identifier for the user submitting the request, typically used for associating the enriched data with a specific user in your system. |
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tigertek-contacts-enrichment-api.p.rapidapi.com/enrich"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tigertek-contacts-enrichment-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: sandbox
api_list.description:
Returns a demo set of data with which you can build your application without incurring API costs.

**Request Object:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| firstName | string | Yes | The first name of the contact. |
| lastName | string | Yes | The last name of the contact. |
| email | string | Yes | The email address of the contact. |
| lead | string | No | The company name of the contact. |
| linkedin | string | Yes | The LinkedIn profile URL of the contact. Exclude the trailing slash. |
| userId | string | Yes | A unique identifier for the user submitting the request, typically used for associating the enriched data with a specific user in your system. |
